it.polimi.se2019.client

Class View

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.util.Observable
      • it.polimi.se2019.client.View
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer<Response>, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CLIView, GUIView

    public abstract class View
extends Observable
implements Observer<Response>
    The View abstract class provides reception of response message from the server and also send request messages to the server
    Author:
    andreahuang
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • connect

        public void connect(java.lang.String nickname,
                    java.lang.String ip,
                    java.lang.String connectionType,
                    java.lang.String map)
        The connect method initializes a connection to the server sending its nickname and a map preference.
        Parameters:
        nickname - is the client's nickname.
        ip - is the server's ip address.
        connectionType - is the connection type, either RMI or socket.

      • sendInput

        public void sendInput()
        The sendInput method sends an input message to the server, only if the client is the current player of the match.

        public abstract void showMessage(java.lang.String message)
        The showMessage method shows a message received as response from the server, it may execute some methods for input selection.
        Parameters:
        message - a response message containing info on the performed action.

        public abstract void reportError(java.lang.String error)
